ca.corefacility.gview.data.readers

Class GenbankFormatModified

  • java.lang.Object
    • GenbankFormat
      • ca.corefacility.gview.data.readers.GenbankFormatModified

  • public class GenbankFormatModified
extends GenbankFormat
    Code from biojava 1.7.1 org.biojavax.bio.seq.io.GenbankFormat Enables parsing of genbank files which have no sequence data into a sequence object. Fills all sequence data with ambiguity characters (N). Only works for DNA/RNA genbank files.
    Author:
    aaron
